description:
A framework to help you build meaningful communities.



The Community Canvas is a framework that helps people and organizations build stronger communities. It provides a template for anyone who brings people together.


This is the Figma Version of the framework, ready to be used as a workshop using FigJam. You can find the easy steps to run this workshop effortlessly.


Get all the information, instructions and credits in https://community-canvas.org/


All Community Canvas documents are released under Creative Commons license BY-NC-SA 4.0. More about that here.



PS: This excellent framework was really helpful when creating the Friends of Figma Barcelona Community :)
